newsitem.title: EU: OFFICIAL JOURNAL CONTENTS - OJ L 85 OF MARCH 27, 1997.
newsitem.headline: OFFICIAL JOURNAL CONTENTS - OJ L 85 OF MARCH 27, 1997.

text.p: * Decision of the EEA Joint Committee No 55/96 of 28 October 1996 amending Protocol 31 to the EEA Agreement, on cooperation in specific fields outside the four freedoms
Decision of the EEA Joint Committee No 1/97 of 30 January 1997 amending Annex II (Technical regulations, standards, testing and certification) to the EEA Agreement
Decision of the EEA Joint Committee No 2/97 of 10 February 1997 amending Annex VI (Social security) to the EEA Agreement END OF DOCUMENT.
